title: NVIDIA Isaac: The AI-Robot Brain
description: NVIDIA Isaac is a comprehensive platform for the development, simulation, and deployment of AI-powered robotics. It bridges the gap between digital AI and physical robots, offering specialized tools for high-fidelity simulation (Isaac Sim), perception (Isaac ROS), and robot control. For humanoid robotics, Isaac acts as a powerful "AI-Robot Brain," enabling capabilities like advanced perception, simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM), and robust sim-to-real transfer.
